column4: hello :) I am trying to compile a package (git://github.com/herzi/pongo.git) but it won’t work because it says I haven’t got gstreamer installed: configure: error: Package requirements (
But afaik I have it, searched through synaptic to no avail – any ideas?
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
